name: Engaging Destiny
description:
You play as Calen, a new knight fresh from his accolade, as he leaves with his long-time mentor, Warrick, on a mission for King Beramond. Explore the town of Faranel, interact with the townspeople and find all sorts of hidden goodies while Calen strives to be the best knight he can be. Though, this knight's values might be a little off, thanks to his voyeuristic tendencies.

This game is a 2D platformer with heavy story elements to it.

Enjoy a beautiful town full of life and its surrounding areas to explore while leading Calen along on his adventure. You'll be able to romance several different men through the adventure and find various naughty things to view along the way. Some scenes might be straightforward, but some might require a little sleuthing around to uncover.

- Strong Sexual Content (Gay Men content, including stuff like Voyeurism, Anal Sex, Blowjobs, Handjobs, Dragon Cloaca, and more).
- A world full of unique lore!
- 16 NSFW Animated Scenes to unlock!
- Over 40 Unique NPCs to meet and interact with!
- Over 40 unique Accolades to unlock!
- Day/Night Cycles!
- A brilliantly composed chiptune OST with 18 tracks!

Other Information:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------​
** We strongly recommend trying the demo before purchasing the full game to check for compatibility issues!​ **

​-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------​

Information for PC users:
- This is for 64-bit systems. It will not work on 32-bit systems.
- For Full-Screen Mode - Alt + Enter

Information for Mac users:
We are aware of an issue with text not appearing correctly on all Mac devices. Usually, setting the game from and to full screen corrects this (CMD+F).

Apple Silicon users - please try the demo first. Unfortunately, the graphics APIs that Unity was built against (Apple Metal) don't seem to work properly with Apple Silicon chips. This will cause significant graphical glitches that make the game very hard to play/read. MacOS builds were created and tested against Intel-based Macs and seem to work fine with workarounds available.​

Controller Information:
Not all controllers are compatible. If you are finding the game to slow down to a crawl and become super laggy while using a controller, please switch to using a keyboard or a different controller.​

Controllers with known issues:
- Nintendo Switch Pro Controller
-PS4 controllers + DS4 Windows

**Note about the Demo
- Only 3 (of 16!) NSFW CG scenes are viewable in the demo.
